title: Thai Airways gets nod from creditors for rehabilitation plan
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Thailand’s embattled flag carrier Thai Airways International has set the course to recovery as its creditors have accepted the carrier’s revised rehabilitation plan The airline reported to the Stock Exchange of Thailand on September 1 that creditors who hold 78.59

The post Thai Airways gets nod from creditors for rehabilitation plan appeared first on Investvine.
